This is a framework to discuss a potential talk on the realities of data transparency at a government level, the various factors which need to be considered by governmental bodies when deciding what data to share and in what way. 

covering such topics as:

- The legislation and implementation gap: Keyword of Machine Interpretable
- Accountability vs Privacy and how that determines what is shared


## Legislation vs Implementation 

* Look into the relevant regulations around public bodies publishing data

## Accountability vs Privacy

There will always be a trade off to be made when publishing data collected by public bodies, since those bodies are normally in possesion of a unique position of privilledge when it comes to personal level data
